Title: Relates to automatic eligibility for early intervention services for children found to have elevated venous blood lead levels
Summary: Relates to automatic eligibility for early intervention services for children found to have elevated venous blood lead levels (at or above 5 mcg/dl).
LawCode: Amd ยง2541, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to infant eligibility for state early intervention services due to elevated venous blood lead levels
